00279 
00280 void printSpeedSet(int xDim, int yDim, double resolution, SpeedSet& speedSet){
00281         int xSize = xDim;
00282         int ySize = yDim;
00283         unsigned int numTent = speedSet.getNumTentacle();
00284         std::vector<std::string> occGrid(xSize+1, std::string(ySize+1, '_'));
00285         ROS_INFO("Speed Set Gird Generated");
00286         for(int t=0; t<numTent; t++){
00287                 Tentacle tentacle = speedSet.getTentacle(t);
00288                 //ROS_INFO("Got Tentacle %d", t);
00289                 for(unsigned int p=0; p<tentacle.getPoints().size(); p++){
00290                         oryx_path_planning::Point point(tentacle.getPoints().at(p));
00291                         //ROS_INFO("Got Point at <%f, %f>", point.x, point.y);
00292                         point.y+=ySize/2;
00293                         //ROS_INFO("Placing Point at <%f, %f>", point.x, point.y);
00294                         if(point.x<xDim&&point.y<yDim&&point.x>=0&&point.y>=0)occGrid.at(point.x).replace(point.y,1,"T");
00295                 }
00296                 //ROS_INFO("Done with Tentacle %d", t);
00297         }
00298         std::string output;
00299 
00300         for(unsigned int i=0;i<occGrid.size(); i++){
00301                 output+=occGrid.at(i);
00302                 output+="\r\n";
00303         }
00304 
00305         ROS_INFO("\n%s", output.c_str());
00306 }
